verses.name: Psalms 63:6
verses.text: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

verses.name: Psalms 63:7
verses.text: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

verses.name: Psalms 63:8
verses.text: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.

verses.name: Psalms 63:9
verses.text: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 63:10
verses.text: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.

verses.name: Psalms 63:11
verses.text: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
